description: Version 07 is the current version of the data set. The Integrated Multi-satellitE Retrievals for GPM (IMERG) is a NASA product estimating global surface precipitation rates at a high resolution of 0.1Â° every half-hour beginning 2000. This dataset is the GPM Level 3 IMERG Final Daily 10 x 10 km (GPM_3IMERGDF) derived from the half-hourly GPM_3IMERGHH.

precipitation.description: Daily mean precipitation rate (combined microwave-IR) estimate

attrs.long_name: Daily mean precipitation rate (combined microwave-IR) estimate

precipitation_cnt.description: Count of all valid half-hourly precipitation retrievals for the day

attrs.long_name: Count of all valid half-hourly precipitation retrievals for the day

MWprecipitation.description: Daily mean High Quality precipitation rate from all available microwave sources

attrs.long_name: Daily mean High Quality precipitation rate from all available microwave sources

randomError.description: Root-mean-square error estimate for combined microwave-IR daily precipitation rate

attrs.long_name: Root-mean-square error estimate for combined microwave-IR daily precipitation rate

probabilityLiquidPrecipitation.description: Probability of liquid precipitation estimated with a diagnostic parameterization using ancillary data

attrs.description: Probability of liquid precipitation estimated with a diagnostic parameterization using ancillary data. 0=missing values; 1=likely solid; 100=likely liquid or no precipitation.

providers.name: NASA Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC)
